description: This file defines the ToDoPresenter class for a GWT-based ToDo application, managing task lifecycle, UI updates, routing, and local storage persistence.

classes.name: ToDoPresenter
classes.description: Main class managing the ToDo application's presentation logic, including task management, routing, and persistence.

classes.name: ToDoPresenter.View
classes.description: Interface for the view component, defining methods for UI interactions and updates.

classes.name: ToDoPresenter.ViewEventHandler
classes.description: Interface for handling user events from the view.

methods.name: ToDoPresenter
methods.description: Constructor initializing the presenter, loading state, setting up event handlers and routing.

methods.name: setupHistoryHandler
methods.description: Sets up routing based on browser history changes.

methods.name: parseRoutingToken
methods.description: Converts URL hash tokens into routing enum values.

methods.name: updateFilteredList
methods.description: Filters tasks based on current routing state.

methods.name: updateTaskStatistics
methods.description: Calculates and updates task counts in the UI.

methods.name: deleteTask
methods.description: Removes a task and updates the view.

methods.name: itemStateChanged
methods.description: Handles updates to individual task states.

methods.name: taskStateChanged
methods.description: Updates UI and saves state after task changes.

methods.name: markAllCompleted
methods.description: Sets all tasks to completed or active.

methods.name: addTask
methods.description: Creates a new task from user input.
